summary: Verified all 3 bug fixes for Clod Sarnit (Claude.ai clone): KB document links open in new tabs, document viewer has visible scrollbar, and Think/Web toggle settings persist per conversation.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: KB document links should open in new tabs
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Tested file viewer with markdown file (eStyle_VASOL_Language_Section.md). All links have target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'. Found 8 links in the file content, all correctly configured to open in new tabs.
bugs_verified_fixed.code_location: ProjectDetailPage.jsx lines 593-595 - ReactMarkdown component with custom 'a' component

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Document viewer should have visible scrollbar
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Verified .file-content-viewer CSS class is applied with scrollbarWidth: 'thin', overflowY: 'scroll'. CSS in index.css lines 23-46 provides visible scrollbar styling for webkit and Firefox browsers.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Think toggle should persist per conversation
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Tested Think toggle persistence: 1) Set Think ON, 2) Navigated away to Projects page, 3) Returned to Test Conversation - Think was still ON. Also verified persistence after page reload.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Web toggle should persist per conversation
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Tested Web toggle persistence: 1) Set Web ON, 2) Navigated away to Projects page, 3) Returned to Test Conversation - Web was still ON. Also verified persistence after page reload.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Think and Web should be mutually exclusive for Bedrock Claude
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Tested mutual exclusivity: With Think ON, clicked Web toggle - Think was automatically disabled and toast message 'Extended Thinking disabled - cannot use both with Bedrock' was displayed. Web toggle became ON.
bugs_verified_fixed.code_location: ChatPage.jsx lines 722-727 (Think disables Web), 776-781 (Web disables Think)

file_viewer_scrollbar.test: Opened markdown file in file viewer dialog
file_viewer_scrollbar.css_verified: index.css .file-content-viewer class with webkit and Firefox scrollbar styles

links_target_blank.test: Checked links in markdown file viewer
links_target_blank.result: PASSED - All 8 links have target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'

think_toggle_persistence.test: Toggle Think ON, navigate away, return
think_toggle_persistence.result: PASSED - Think toggle persisted after navigation and page reload

web_toggle_persistence.test: Toggle Web ON, navigate away, return
web_toggle_persistence.result: PASSED - Web toggle persisted after navigation and page reload

mutual_exclusivity.test: With Think ON, click Web toggle
mutual_exclusivity.result: PASSED - Think automatically disabled, toast message shown

seed_data_creation: None - used existing 'Test Conversation' in 'History Items and Stimuli' project
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bug fixes verified working. The app uses AWS Bedrock (Claude) as the LLM provider. Think/Web toggle settings are stored per conversation in the database via PUT /api/conversations/{id} endpoint. The file viewer uses ReactMarkdown with custom link component for target='_blank'. Scrollbar CSS is in index.css with .file-content-viewer class.
